title: I need help with my Account
body:
Hey there, i tried to log into my main Account (Am√¥x), but it tells me my account is in any kind of transferring Progress and i shall try in a few minutes again, but even after i waited hours, i cant login.. 
I wanted to play with my friends, so i created this one, so maybe get some help from the Community or even admins, or the Support team, if they see this. 
I never wanted any transfer or something like, i dont know how this happened and i just wanna play on my Account. I hope anyone here can help me. Thanks & Greetings! :)

replies.body: I did, i gave all information i actually remember, if anything else is really needed, i'd probably have to search through my emails, how long can it take until i get an answer, tho? Its just sad, that from one day to another i cant use my account anymore for no reason :(

http://i.giphy.com/QwH7v7J1tBrq0.gif

Reach out to our account team ASAP by shooting us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and picking "I need help recovering my account". After we verify you were the account creator, we'll be able to secure your account and repair any damage that might have taken place!
